message.content:
<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: 
Set<String> windowsid = driver.getWindowHandles();
Iterator<String> iterate = windowsid.iterator();
String mainwindow_id = "";
String tabbedwindow_id = "";

if(iterate.hasNext()){
    mainwindow_id = iterate.next();
}

if(iterate.hasNext()){
    tabbedwindow_id = iterate.next();
}

while(iterate.hasNext()){    
    System.out.println(iterate.next());
}
<<<explanation>>>: The error occurs because you are trying to call iterate.next() when there are no more elements in the iterator. You should always check if there are more elements in the iterator by calling iterate.hasNext() before calling iterate.next().
